title: Week In Politics: Iran Nuclear Deal Announcement, 'Religious Freedom' Laws
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with political commentators Jonathan Capehart of the Washington Post and David Brooks of The New York Times about the Iran nuclear deal announcement, the latest around the religious freedom laws in Indiana and Arkansas, and N.J. Sen. Robert Menendez's corruption charges.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
